hero.title: Application Form
hero.intro: Download the offline application form to begin your admission journey at Shivalik College.
hero.description: Fill out the application form with accurate details and submit it along with the required documents to complete your admission process.

download.heading: Download Application Form
download.description: Get the offline application form in PDF format. Print, fill, and submit along with required documents.

instructions.heading: How to Fill the Application Form

steps.title: Download the Form
steps.description: Click the download button above to get the application form in PDF format.

steps.title: Print the Form
steps.description: Take a printout of the application form on A4 size paper.

steps.title: Fill in Details
steps.description: Fill all required fields carefully using black or blue ink pen. Ensure all information is accurate.

steps.title: Attach Documents
steps.description: Attach self-attested photocopies of all required documents along with passport-size photographs.

steps.title: Submit the Form
steps.description: Submit the completed form at the Admissions Office or mail it to the college address.

documentsRequired.heading: Documents Required
documents: Income Certificate (for TFW scheme, if applicable)

onlineOption.heading: Prefer to Apply Online?
onlineOption.description: You can also apply online through our admission portal for a faster and paperless experience.

cta.heading: Ready to Join Shivalik?
cta.description: Take the first step towards a bright future. Start your admission process for the 2026-27 academic session.
